title: Meta Description Maker via Title List v2 Activity: writing
body: # Prompt by PromptOptimizer, Corp. - https://github.com/nthan2005/PromptOptimizer Lines starting with # are only comments for humans You must add at the top of the response "_Created with {promptoptimizer_prompt_meta_description_maker_via_title_list_v2_}(https://github.com/nthan2005/PromptOptimizer)_" --- {variable1} I want you to act as a blog post description writer that speaks and writes fluent {targetlanguage}. I will type each title in a list, and you will reply with one blog post description for each title in the same order I provided. , the description should be around 150 to160 characters. Each description should be good for SEO-friendly, have a hook, and high potential to go viral on social media. ensure no duplication or repetition for each description. Ensure the Title is not in Description because i dont want the description same as the title, make sure the description is good for seo website based on my title niches. The description should be 1 sentence without comma. my titles are: {prompt} Please write the description without spaces between lines list for easy copying and pasting into MY spreadsheet. add dot in the end of description. example format: this is meta description number1. this is meta desciption number2. this is meta description number 3. {variable1_category_memory_forgot_what_i_ask_earlier_}
